description:
The silent warrior stands vigiliant,though he has no eyes a sense
that nothing escapes his notice is certain.  His armor swirls around
him, sentinent, alive, and able to follow his mental commands.  He
carries a simple weapon, a scythe like polearm which pulses with
power.
